summary: All 16 tests passed for exercise exact matching and billing page updates. Both critical fixes verified working correctly: 1) GET /api/exercises?names=... now uses EXACT matching only (no fuzzy fallback), 2) Billing page has only 2 plans (Monthly £7.99, Yearly £74.99 with 22% discount).
critical_code_review_comments: AI workout generator (ai-workout-generator.ts) correctly includes ALL 1806 exercise names in prompt with strict exact-name instructions
GET /api/exercises endpoint (routes.ts lines 8811-8828) correctly uses case-insensitive exact matching only
Billing page (billing.tsx) correctly has only 2 plans with proper pricing and 22% discount

context_for_next_testing_agent: Exercise exact matching and billing page updates verified working. Test file at /app/tests/test_exercise_matching_and_billing.py covers: (1) Exact name matching - Barbell Bench Press returns 1 result, (2) No fuzzy match - 'Fake Exercise Name' returns 0, (3) Critical user complaint - 'Incline Dumbbell Press' does NOT match 'Dumbbell Incline Bench Press', (4) Multiple exact names work - Lat Pulldown,Deadlift,Glute Bridge returns 3 results, (5) Billing page has 2 plans only with 22% yearly discount.
